import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import mycontext from'./Context/Createcontext';import daily from'./Usedata/Daily png.png';import dicon from'./Usedata/delete.png';import Alertcontext from'./Context/AlertContext';import Navbar from'./Navbar';import Alerts from'./Alert';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Selectdata(){const{Note,Getnotes,DeleteNote}=useContext(mycontext);const{Checkalert}=useContext(Alertcontext);const[start,SetStart]=useState("2023/02/20");const[End,SetEnd]=useState("2023/03/20");//Call Use Effect Hook To refresh The Data
useEffect(()=>{Getnotes();},[]);// Found Input Value
const StartChange=e=>{SetStart(e.target.value);};const EndChange=e=>{SetEnd(e.target.value);};const startDate=start.toString();const EndDate=End.toString();// formating Date Function
function formateDate(dateString){const[day,month,year]=dateString.split('/');return"".concat(year,"-").concat(month,"-").concat(day);}// Note Filter By Dates
const filteredResults=Note.filter(item=>{const itemDate=formateDate(item.date);return itemDate>=startDate&&itemDate<=EndDate;});console.log(filteredResults);//Delete Note Functions
const Delete=()=>{const conform=window.confirm("Are you Sure you want to delete your data ?");if(conform){const id=filteredResults.map(note=>{return note._id;});DeleteNote(id[0]);Checkalert('Your Work Note Successfully Deleted','Success');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{result:filteredResults}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alerts,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex inputbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"",className:"Selectlable",children:"Start Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"mx-2 myinput Rinput",type:"date",name:"start",value:start,onChange:StartChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"",className:"Selectlable",children:"End Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"mx-2 myinput Rinput",type:"date",name:"end",value:End,onChange:EndChange})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"my-3 text-center showdata",children:"Show Your Data"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),filteredResults.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center showdata  nodata",children:"Data Not Found..!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:filteredResults.map(note=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between newcard my-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:" icon",onClick:Delete,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"daily",src:dicon,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:note.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Price : ",note.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Work : ",note.work]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:daily,alt:"",className:"daily"}),note.dailywork]})]});})})]})]});}export default Selectdata;
